question: (Jon of the Clue Crew plop, plops 2 tablets in a glass; they fizz, fizz.)  When you drop Alka-Seltzer in water, a series of reactions, including the release of carbon dioxide, creates this bubbly effect, from the Latin for "begin to boil"
